item.title: Automate Fixes through Pull Requests
item.description: Automate Fixes Through Pull Requests By adding another Intgration into Bridgecrew, we can generate automated Pull Requests (PR’s) into your Github repository, to update your CloudFormation manifests and fix security issues! To do this, we’ll use the “Github” Source Control integration within the Bridgecrew Dashboard, allowing Bridgecrew to raise pull requests (and also, scan incoming pull requests automatically for issues!) Just like the previous AWS Github authorization, you can choose which repositories to give Bridgecrew permission to access.
